featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for this passage? (A) Totem Poles, the Legends of Aboriginal Peoples (B) Totem Poles: Their Functions (C) Totem Poles, Symbols of Historical Resistance (D) Totem Poles: Their Designs 46.
The story about Hou-I shooting down nine suns is a well-known Chinese _____, but it may not be a true historical event.

definition.zh_def: 與過去的事件、時期或人物有關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to past events, periods, or figures.
definition.example: The museum has a collection of historical artifacts.
